document.full_text: a delta air lines passenger who allegedly tried to open an emergency exit door mid-air pleaded not guilty on wednesday to charges of interfering with aircraft operations, authorities said.
document.title: man pleads not guilty in plane exit door incident
lines_and_colors: a delta air lines passenger who allegedly tried to open an emergency exit door mid-air pleaded not guilty on wednesday to charges of interfering with aircraft operations, authorities said.
